features: NATURAL & GENTLE SKIN CLEANSER - Discover the power of Acure Face Brightening Cleansing Gel, designed to effectively remove impurities and uncover your skin's natural looking healthy glow with nutrient-packed cleanser, leaving your skin feeling refreshed everytime

TRIPLE ANTIOXIDANT BLEND - Indulge your skin in a refreshing and hydrating cleanse with our all natural vegan facial cleanser gel. A powerful formula infused with an antoixidant blend of pomegranate, blackberry, and acai infused with antioxidant rich of Superfruit + Chlorella Blend

WASH FOR EFFORTLESS GLOW - Remove the worry of dark spots dull skin with our skin brightening cleansing gel, a gentle exfoliating cleanser that targets dark spots and uneven tone. Get ready with our gel cleanser face for a more radiant complexion!

ALL TYPE SKIN-FRIENDLY FORMULA - Our skin brightening cleanser formulated to suit all skin types, to work wash away dirt, oil and make-up. From sensitive skin to oily, it adapts effortlessly, gently purging toxins and restoring skin's health!

CRUELTY-FREE COMMITMENT - Embrace guilt-free beauty. We proudly wear the badge of being 100% vegan and certified cruelty-free. Providing long-lasting results without harmful effect of paraben, sulfate, mineral oil, petrolatum and formaldehyde.
body.description: Get glowing with this super gentle, nutrient-packed cleanser that gets right to work washing away dirt, oil and make-up. Antioxidant-rich pomegranate, blackberry and acai team up to support your skin’s inherent awesomeness.

reviews.reviewText: It’s is light, nice smell, a little goes a long way. I enjoy this face cleanser. Would recommend. I have normal to dry skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just a little gel will create a lot of lather
reviews.reviewText: This is a good product, and I wanted to buy it again with other ingredients, but none were available. I got a little tired of the slightly overwhelming lemon scent, but if you like a citrus scent, you'll love this. Leaves my face feeling clean and supple - never tight. It's a very good formula.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All around good facial cleanser
reviews.reviewText: I really like gel facial cleansers so this was perfect for me and at a great price! It foams a lot and doesn't feel stripping. It has a very mild citrous scent, not sure if that would bother you if you have sensitive skin. But I have normal to oily skin and I love this cleanser!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Acure is my miracle brand!
reviews.reviewText: I am in love with Acure! I have struggled to find natural hair and skin care products that work for me, and Acure has been a winner in all categories. I will note, however, that knowing your hair and skin types and choosing products based off them seems to be more important with natural products. I never paid attention to things like that before and never had any issues, but have run into a few Acure products that didn't quite cut it at first and I realized it was because it didn't match up well with my hair/skin type.Anyway, now to this moisturizer. I have an awful mix of combo, sensitive, and acne prone skin. Then to make things more interesting, I am also allergic to all the active ingredients found in acne treatments and some unknown ingredient that is usually in parfum (a compound of chemicals that companies don't have to tell you the individual ingredients of because it is usually a patented formula...yay me!). So was told to only buy products marketed for sensitive skin with no fragrance. Unfortunately, everything I tried over the years either made my face so oily and gross or made me break out horribly...like the huge, super painful zits. So for years my skincare routine consisted of washing my face with the gold dial soap bar and occasionally using a scrub when the dry skin across my cheekbones got to bugging me.A few weeks ago I started using Acure's face wash and decided to give this moisturizer a try. I was immediately impressed by how well it soaked into my skin. Within days my skin is so soft and I've had no breakouts. For someone who has never been able to use a moisturizer, this is a miracle product for me. And I small bit really does go a long way. Even using 1-2 times a day, I see this stuff lasting a while.I started out with Acure's facial cleansing cream a few weeks ago, but something just seemed kinda....off. So I ordered the gel instead and the difference it made in just one wash! Wow...my skin felt amazing after getting out of the shower! I'm sure the cream works for some people, but it was too thick for my combo skin. The gel is much lighter and not as moisturizing. I start with Acure's pore clarifying facial scrub, then this wash, and follow up with their oil matifying facial moisturizer. I also use the pore clarifying face mask once a week. My skin has never felt or looked so good. I am finally seeing am improvement in the blackheads that have been lingering since puberty and my skin seems more even, bright, less irritated looking, and so soft. Acure has been my miracle for both my hair and skin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A little too intense for sensitive skin.
reviews.reviewText: When it comes to cosmetics, (and life), there's two things to always remember:1.) Everything is relative.2.) Everything in moderation.It's important to be critical of every product you find and plan to try; check the ingredients, take your time, and don't get desperate. What results may work for some will not necessarily work for you. Give your skin the time and space it needs to breathe, and don't go crazy with the number of products you use, or more importantly, the frequency. I have extremely sensitive and reactive skin, and after using this product every other day, once a day for a week, I noticed pretty intense drying followed by a rash. After discontinuing use I began to notice an immediate improvement, so I'm convinced this wasn't working for me.Still a very solid product and I could see it working well for heartier skin types. It's simple, and the fragrance is nice, not overpowering. It dispenses in a gel form and lathers very smoothly. Not a bad price either.Overall I give this product 3 stars; it did not work for what I needed and did not fit my skin type, but it is obviously still a quality product.

I have combination skin with acne concerns. I found that this product :-Removes makeup and oil from skin well-Doesn't leave my skin feeling dry/ irritated afterwards-Does not irritate acne-Has a light lemon scent-Using one to two pea sized amounts, cleanser lasted me about two months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Make skin feel clean, fresh and bright
reviews.reviewText: I really like this cleaner. It works really well on my skin. It does sting a bit, but I just don't leave it on for to long
Ich bin zufrieden mit diesem Produkt. Meine Haut ist gut gereinigt aber nie Trocken.

Si tratta di un gel detergente che lascia la pelle ben pulita, senza causare quella sensazione di pelle che tira. Effettivamente dopo un mese e mezzo di utilizzo, devo dire che anche l'effetto luminosità, dovuto alla presenza in formula di estratti illuminanti contenenti acidi della frutta, è visibile. Io ho la pelle mista, ma penso possa andare benissimo anche per pelli normali e grasse. Ha un delizioso ma discreto odore di limone.

he tratado de cambiar a productos que sean 100% naturales, y al leer la lista de ingredientes en muchas marcas supuestamente naturales, al final te das cuenta que no es cierto, que en realidad tienen siliconas, alcohol, PEGs, derrivados del petroleo, etc. etc.esta marca es realmente natural, a precio super accesible, con bonito diseño y ademas el limpiador huele muy bien, como citrico, hace buena espuma y limpia muy bien sin resecar. me encanto. Ojala que amazon tuviera la gama completa de esta marca.
